meanings.definition: The act of preventing or stopping the production and distribution of counterfeit goods.
meanings.sent1: The anticounterfeiting efforts at the border have been successful in seizing fake designer handbags.
meanings.sent2: Companies invest in anticounterfeiting technologies to safeguard their products from being copied.
meanings.sent3: The detective's anticounterfeiting mission turned into a wild goose chase when he realized the 'counterfeit' money was actually real.
meanings.sent4: In the battle against fake merchandise, anticounterfeiting is the shield that protects consumers.
meanings.sent5: The anticounterfeiting campaign raised awareness about the dangers of purchasing fake electronics.

meanings.definition: Measures taken to protect against counterfeit products.
meanings.sent1: The anticounterfeiting strategies included holographic labels and unique serial numbers.
meanings.sent2: Retailers rely on anticounterfeiting techniques to ensure the authenticity of their merchandise.
meanings.sent3: The anticounterfeiting plan backfired when the fake products flooded the market despite their efforts.
meanings.sent4: In the world of luxury goods, anticounterfeiting is a constant battle between authenticity and imitation.
meanings.sent5: The anticounterfeiting measures implemented by the company helped in identifying fake products quickly.
